Chili's Restaurants In Boston, Massachusetts

Locations › US › Massachusetts › Boston

From historical attractions to sports games to live performances, you'll never run out of things to do in Boston. No matter your culinary preferences, Boston has something for everyone. Next time a Tex-Mex craving hits, head to your local Chili's for appetizers, entrees, and desserts that are sure to please.

Convenient Locations in Boston

You can find several Chili's restaurants in the Boston area. Closest to downtown Boston is the Chili's at 1040 Revere Beach Parkway in Chelsea. Further out, we have locations in Dedham, Reading, Braintree, Burlington, and Danvers. Other nearby Chili's include those in Wilmington Crossing, Walpole, Lowell, and Westford.

An Extensive Menu for Tex-Mex Fans

Start with an order of Classic Nachos (your choice of fajita chicken or fajita beef) before moving on to Beef Enchiladas, Loaded Fajitas, or Spicy Shrimp Tacos. Looking for something lighter? Try our Fresh Guacamole and a Fresh Mex Bowl or Fresco Salad. For dessert, try our Molten Chocolate Cake or Triple Berry Crumble Cake. Even if Tex-Mex isn't your thing, you'll find plenty to love at Chili's, from our ribeye, sirloin, baby back ribs, and wings to our burgers and sandwiches.

Browse our list of Boston restaurants to check wait times, order online, and find hours, addresses, and phone numbers for each location.

Serving Boston and local neighborhoods including:

Back Bay, Beacon Hill, Brookline, Cambridge, Charlestown, Dorchester, Downtown Boston, Fenway/Kenmore, Financial District, Jamaica Plain, Marlborough, North End, Seaport District, Somerville, South Boston, South End, Theatre District, Waterfront, Watertown
